abstract: Citi’s investment bank has staged a series of wacky challenges that have raise more than  $180,000 to helps injured members of the armed forces.
snippet: Citi’s investment bank has staged a series of wacky challenges that have raise more than  $180,000 to helps injured members of the armed forces.
lead_paragraph: Tug of war on the trading floor? Boccie balls between the rows of Bloomberg terminals? A Hula-Hoop shake-off that saw more than a half-dozen men and women strut their stuff?

headline.main: At Citigroup, ‘Feats of Strength’ for Veterans
